title: Senior Unix System Administrator
description: Mô tả công việc
Job Purpose:
Job Purpose:
 Setup and Maintenance of the firms UNIX/Linux infrastructure
 UNIX/Linux second level helpdesk including troubleshooting problems
 Providing 1st line support for EU users alongside other IT members in the EU timezone.
Principal Accountabilities:
Principal Accountabilities:
 Management of all UNIX systems and services worldwide
 Monitoring of Worldwide Linux systems for stability and performance
 Trouble shoot and provide local support for end users
 Recommend and implement root cause fixes for common issues.
 Maintain internal user guides, guidance notes and technical documents
 1st Level Windows client/server support as required in exceptional cases
 On call/standby work during scheduled out of hours IT upgrades
 Behave in a professional and creditable manner; communicate issues through the Manager.
 Provide weekly reports to the Manager
 Mentoring of junior team members
Key Performance Measures:
Key Performance Measures:
 Support performance / turnaround on resolution of critical incidents
 Performance on Project & task management
 Ability to run a project/task with minimal input from others.
 Can work with external/internal resources to achieve a goal.
yc: Yêu cầu công việc
